original_title: Eighth Van Cliburn International Piano Competition: Here to Make Music
overview: Emmy Award winning documentary, directed by Peter Rosen, about the Eighth Van Cliburn International Piano Competition in 1989, featuring interviews with the contestants and jurists, and footage from rehearsals and performances, including by  competition winner Alexei Sultanov.
title: Eighth Van Cliburn International Piano Competition: Here to Make Music
